name: Halls of Humsworth
description:
Overview

Fight through waves of ghouls and monsters in this action-packed top down shooter rogue-lite! Choose your character and delve into Castle Humsworth alone or with a friend. Collect coins to buy powerful items on your run. Rack up a combo to get a high score, and use your points to get permanent upgrades. Will you discover the secret behind the castle's curse?

Features

  • 7 unique playable characters (6 of which are unlockable), each with their own special abilities!
  • 50 powerful items to find!
  • 5 distinct levels with their own enemies and bosses!
  • 2-player local co-op!
  • 32 permanent upgrades purchasable with the points earned on your runs!
  • 3 difficulty modes to challenge any player!
  • Support for keyboard and gamepad (Xbox and PS4) controls!
  • And more!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HumsworthGame
